dct_title_s: Indien onder den Heer Lopo Vaz de Sampayo, als Gouverneur Generaal, tot aan Nieuw-Spanje in America en kusten van Peru en Chili bevaaren
dct_description_sm: Map extending from Africa to the Americas. Covers the Indian Ocean and the Pacific Ocean, the islands and adjacent landmasses, stretching from the east African coast to the coast of North and South America. The map shows the equator and in the lower middle, part of Australia (named Hollandia Nova). Relief shown pictorially.
Early state of Pieter van der Aa's map of Asia-Pacific: Indien onder den Heer Lopo Vaz de Sampayo.
In lower right margin: Lopo Vaz de Sampayo.
Scale: Milliaria Germanica Communia 15 in uno grada, Milliaria Hispanica Communia 17 1/2 in uno grada.
Prime meridian: Ferro? Coordinates on map converted to Greenwich for this record.
Plate [17] from: Naaukkeurige versameling der gedenk-waardigste zee en landreysen na Oost en West-Indien.
dct_publisher_sm: door Pieter Vander Aa, met privilegie
